episodes.title: ESCAPING TWIN FLAMES
episodes.description: Today on Art of the Cut we’re talking with one of the ACE Eddie winning editors of “Escaping Twin Flames,” which won the Eddie for Best Edited Documentary, non-theatrical. Inbal Lessner was the Executive Producer and Supervising editor. We last spoke with Inbal for Seduced: Inside the NXIVM Cult “Exposed” which was nominated for an ACE Eddie in 2021. Her other work includes the documentaries, Brave Miss World, CNN’s series of “decade” defining documentaries - Mothers in the Middle and Can We All Just Get Along, for which she was nominated for an ACE Eddie. In addition to her documentary work, she was an additional editor on Natalie Portman’s directorial debut, A Tale of Love and Darkness. Follow along with the transcript and great visuals, including trailers, clips, timeline screenshots and more at borisfx.com/blog/aotc
